verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6031"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* help \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day-time, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w cry|strong="H6031"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*;

let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer come \w into|strong="H3915"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w*, incline \w your|strong="H3068"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*.
\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* am sated \w with|strong="H6440"\w* sorrow, \w my|strong="H5186"\w* life draws \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* Sheol.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am counted \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* go \w down|strong="H5060"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w pit|strong="H7585"\w*; \w without|strong="H3588"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w My|strong="H1961"\w* home \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* dead, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* slain \w that|strong="H1397"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grave, \w whom|strong="H1397"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* remember \w no|strong="H1961"\w* \w more|strong="H1961"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3381"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* they \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* hand.

\w In|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* deepest pit \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w*, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* shadows deep \w and|strong="H3027"\w* dark.
\w Your|strong="H7896"\w* wrath lies heavy upon \w me|strong="H7896"\w*, waves \w of|strong="H8482"\w* \w your|strong="H7896"\w* anger roll over \w me|strong="H7896"\w*. \qs Selah\qs*

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w put|strong="H5564"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* shun \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am shut \w in|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* cannot escape,

\w my|strong="H3045"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H3045"\w* wasted \w with|strong="H3318"\w* sorrow. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* call \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w every|strong="H3318"\w* day, spreading \w my|strong="H3045"\w* hands \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dead \w can|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* work wonders? \w Can|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shades rise again \w to|strong="H3068"\w* praise \w you|strong="H3605"\w*? \qs Selah\qs*

\w Can|strong="H6213"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* kindness \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* grave, \w your|strong="H6213"\w* faithfulness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* tomb?

Can \w your|strong="H5608"\w* wonders \w be|strong="H2617"\w* known \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* darkness, \w or|strong="H5608"\w* \w your|strong="H5608"\w* help \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* land \w of|strong="H6913"\w* forgetfulness?

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* cry \w for|strong="H3045"\w* help \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* morning \w my|strong="H3045"\w* prayer comes \w before|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

Why, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1242"\w* spurn \w me|strong="H6923"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hide \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6923"\w*?

\w From|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* youth \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* wretched \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dying, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* numbed \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* terrors \w I|strong="H5315"\w* bear.
\w The|strong="H5375"\w* fires \w of|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* wrath \w have|strong="H5375"\w* passed \w over|strong="H5375"\w* me, \w your|strong="H5375"\w* terrors destroy me,
surging \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* forever, hemming \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* altogether.

\w Those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* love \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* put \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dark \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w only|strong="H3162"\w* friend.
